name: ProtoOS Prototype/Demo
description:
This is my final Major project, To play it, Extract with winrar or 7zip and launch the .exe file 

Synopsis/Summary of the story:

The Player (Sam) is hired by a anonymous client who works for sandcrest studios to try out their newest and greatest, ProtoOS, A Full immersive artificial intelligence operating system which is still in alpha testing, But the program gets hacked and is corrupted by a unknown person, forcing Sam to try and stop this hacker himself inside the program and finding out dark secrets along the way. 

For my development on this project visit my wix site: https://packpersonstudio.wixsite.com/proxyos
